items.title: Bass Hole — Fish Clicker
items.blurb: CYD/ESP32 fish clicker game for the cheap little touchscreen devboard.
items.description: Runs on the ESP32 CYD. Tap fish. Earn points. That's it.

items.title: Canine Cleanup — Clicker Game
items.blurb: Progressive clicker game for a fictional dog cleanup service.
items.description: Web-based idle/clicker with upgrade loop. A good palette cleanser.

items.title: Wrenchbox — Music Maker
items.blurb: Drag-and-drop sample-based music creation engine, Incredibox-style.
items.description: Browser-based music layering toy with themed packs and bonus unlocks.

items.title: HydroFlow CA — Fluid Simulation
items.blurb: High-performance grid-based fluid simulation using double-buffered cellular automata logic.
items.description: Watch fluid physics emerge from simple grid rules.

_guide: Each item should include: id, title, blurb, description, url. Thumbnail is optional.
